tracks.title: Take Me Away
lyrics: I cannot find a way to describe it
It's there inside, all I do is hide
I wish that it would just go away
What would you do, you do if you knew?
All the pain I thought I knew
All the thoughts lead back to you
Back to what was never said
Back and forth inside my head
I'm unable, come and take me away
I feel like I am all alone
All by myself, I need to get around this
My words are cold, I don't want them to hurt you
If I show you, I don't think you'd understand
All the pain I thought I knew
All the thoughts lead back to you
Back to what was never said
Back and forth inside my head
I'm unable, come and take me away
I'm going nowhere (On and on and...)
I'm getting nowhere (On and on and on), take me away
(And off and on and off and on)
All the pain I thought I knew
All the thoughts lead back to you
Back to what was never said
Back and forth inside my head
I'm unable, come and take me away

tracks.title: Together
lyrics: The truth isn't far behind me
When I turn the lights out
Together, it doesn't feel right at all
Together, together, we've built a wall
This has gone on so long
Together, it doesn't feel right at all
Together, together, we've built a wall
When I'm alone, I (When I'm alone)
And when I'm around you (When I'm around you)
Together, it doesn't feel right at all
Together, together, we've built a wall
Together, it doesn't feel right at all
Together, together, we've built a wall

tracks.title: Don't Tell Me
lyrics: You held my hand and walked me home, I know
Why you gave me that kiss
It was somethin' like this and made me go, "Oh, oh"
You wiped my tears, got rid of all my fears
Why did you have to go?
Guess it wasn't enough to take up some of my love
Guys are so hard to trust
That I'm not like that girl?
The one who gives it all away, yeah, oh
Did you think that I was gonna give it up to you
Did you think that it was something I was gonna do
Don't try to tell me what to do
Don't try to tell me what to say
You're better off that way, yeah
And the fact that your arm is now around my neck
Will get you in my pants
I'll have to kick your ass to make you never forget
I'm gonna ask you to stop
I thought I liked you a lot, but I'm really upset (Really upset)
So get outta my head, get off of my bed
That I'm not like that girl?
The one who throws it all away
Did you think that I was gonna to give it up to you
Did you think that it was something I was gonna do
Don't try to tell me what to do
Don't try to tell me what to say
You're better off that way, yeah
This guilt trip that you put me on
Won't mess me up, I've done no wrong
Any thoughts of you and me have gone away
Did you think that I was gonna give it up to you
Did you think that it was something I was gonna do
Don't try to tell me what to do
Don't try to tell me what to say
You're better off that way, yeah

tracks.title: He Wasn't
lyrics: There's not much goin' on today
I'm really bored, it's gettin' late
Monday's comin', the day I hate
I'll sit on my bed alone (Bed alone)
He wasn't what I wanted, what I thought, no
He wouldn't even open up the door
He never made me feel like I was special
He isn't really what I'm lookin' for
This is when I start to bite my nails
And clean my room when all else fails
I think it's time for me to bail (Time to bail)
This point of view is gettin' stale
I'll sit on my bed alone (Bed alone)
Starin' at the phone (At the phone)
He wasn't what I wanted, what I thought, no
He wouldn't even open up the door
He never made me feel like I was special
He isn't really what I'm lookin' for
Uh, uh, uh, uh, uh-uh (Hey, hey)
Uh, uh, uh, uh, uh-uh (Hey, hey)
I'll sit on my bed alone
He wasn't what I wanted, what I thought, no
He wouldn't even open up the door
He never made me feel like I was special
He isn't really what I'm lookin' for
He wasn't what I wanted, what I thought, no
He wouldn't even open up the door
He never made me feel like I was special
Like I was special, 'cause I was special

tracks.title: How Does It Feel
lyrics: I just need to know that I can breathe
I don't need much of anything
I am small and the world is big
All around me is fast moving
How does it feel to be
How does it feel to be
I am young and I am free
But I get tired and I get weak
I get lost and I can't sleep (I can't sleep)
How does it feel to be (To be)
How does it feel to be (To be)
I am small and the world is big
But I'm not afraid of anything
How does it feel to be (To be)
How does it feel to be (To be)
How does it feel to be (To be)
How does it feel to be (To be)
How does it feel? How does it feel?
How does it feel? How does it feel?
How does it feel? How does it feel?
How does it feel? How does it feel?

tracks.title: My Happy Ending
lyrics: Oh-oh, oh-oh (So much for my happy ending)
Oh-oh, oh-oh (So much for my happy ending)
On such a breakable thread (Breakable thread)
You were all the things I thought I knew
And I thought we could be
We were meant to be, supposed to be
But we lost it (We lost it)
And all of our memories so close to me
All this time, you were pretending
So much for my happy ending
(Oh-oh, oh-oh) So much for my happy ending
I know what they say (I know what they say)
But so are they (But so are they)
Do they even know you? (Even know you)
All the things you hide from me
All the shit that you do (All the shit that you do)
You were all the things I thought I knew
And I thought we could be
We were meant to be, supposed to be
But we lost it (We lost it)
And all of our memories so close to me
All this time, you were pretending
So much for my happy ending
It's nice to know that you were there
Thanks for acting like you care
And making me feel like I was the only one
It's nice to know we had it all
Thanks for watching as I fall
And letting me know we were done
We were meant to be, supposed to be
And all of our memories so close to me
All this time, you were pretending
So much for my happy ending
We were meant to be, supposed to be
But we lost it (We lost it)
And all of our memories so close to me
All this time, you were pretending
So much for my happy ending
(Oh-oh, oh-oh) So much for my happy ending
(Oh-oh, oh-oh) So much for my happy ending

tracks.title: Nobody's Home
lyrics: She wants to go home, but nobody's home
That's where she lies, broken inside
With no place to go, no place to go
To dry her eyes, broken inside
She wants to go home, but nobody's home
That's where she lies, broken inside
With no place to go, no place to go
To dry her eyes, broken inside
Her feeling she hides, her dreams she can't find
She's losin' her mind, she's fallen behind
She can't find her place, she's losin' her faith
She's fallen from grace, she's all over the place
She wants to go home, but nobody's home
That's where she lies, broken inside
With no place to go, no place to go
To dry her eyes, broken inside
She's lost inside, lost inside, oh, oh
She's lost inside, lost inside, oh, oh

tracks.title: Forgotten
lyrics: Don't know how much you screwed it up
Because I'm movin' on, I won't forget
You were the one that was wrong
I know I need to step up and be strong
There's no point in thinking about yesterday
It's too late now, it won't ever be the same
I know I wanna run away
I know I wanna run away, run away
If only I could run away
If only I could run away, run away
I told you what I wanted
I told you what I wanted, what I wanted

tracks.title: Who Knows
lyrics: Why do you look so familiar?
I could swear that I have seen your face before
I think I like that you seem sincere
I think I'd like to get to know you a little bit more
Do what you do, just keep on laughin'
One thing's true, there's always a brand new day
I'm gonna live today like it's my last day
How do you always have an opinion?
And how do you always find the best way to compromise?
We don't need to have a reason
We don't need anything, we're just wasting time
Do what you do, just keep on laughin'
One thing's true, there's always a brand new day
Do what you do, just keep on laughin'
One thing's true, there's always a brand new day
I'm gonna live today like it's my last day
Find yourself, 'cause I can't find you
Find yourself, 'cause I can't find you
Do what you do, just keep on laughin'
One thing's true, there's always a brand new day
So you go and make it happen
Do your best, just keep on laughin'
I'm telling you, there's always a brand new day
Do what you do, just keep on laughin'
One thing's true, there's always a brand new day
I'm gonna live today like it's my last day

tracks.title: Fall to Pieces
lyrics: Then I looked back at you
The things that you can't undo
I pray that we make it through
And I don't wanna fall to pieces
I just wanna sit and stare at you
I don't wanna talk about it
And I don't want a conversation
I just wanna cry in front of you
I don't wanna talk about it
And I don't wanna fall to pieces
I just wanna sit and stare at you
I don't wanna talk about it
And I don't want a conversation
I just wanna cry in front of you
I don't wanna talk about it
I wanna know what this means
I don't wanna fall to pieces
I just wanna sit and stare at you
I don't wanna talk about it
And I don't want a conversation
I just wanna cry in front of you
I don't wanna talk about it
And I don't wanna fall to pieces
I just wanna sit and stare at you
I don't wanna talk about it
And I don't want a conversation
I just wanna cry in front of you
And I don't wanna talk about it

tracks.title: Freak Out
lyrics: Try to tell me what I shouldn't do
Walk around with my hands up in the air
Just freak out, let it go
I can't ever run and hide
I can't watch the time go by
Just freak out, let it go
You don't always have to do everything right
Walk around with your hands up in the air
Just freak out, let it go
I can't ever run and hide
I can't watch the time go by
Just let me live my life
I can't ever run and hide
I can't watch the time go by
Gonna freak out, let it go
Gonna freak out, let it go

tracks.title: Slipped Away
lyrics: I hope you can hear me
I didn't get around to kiss you
I wish that I could see you again
I hope you can hear me
I've had my wake up, won't you wake up?
I keep askin' why (I keep askin' why)
And I can't take it, it wasn't fake, it
Now you're gone, now you're gone
There you go, there you go
Somewhere I can't bring you back
Now you're gone, now you're gone
There you go, there you go
Was the day that I found

tracks.title: I Always Get What I Want
lyrics: Every now and then, we all want something
Even if there's no way of gettin' it
If I stomp my feet, could that maybe
Could I get myself around it?
Don't wanna always have to be so nice
Don't wanna hear you say, "Well, that's just life"
I'll drown you out when I open my mouth
And make my way around it
I always make my way around it
So give me what I want
I always get what I want
You don't want to see me when
I don't get what I want, it's not what you want
I'm not about to take no for an answer, no
If I tell you I can't, I'm still gonna go
I did it all by myself and I found
I found my way around it
So give me what I want
I always get what I want
You don't want to see me when
I don't get what I want, it's not what you want
It could start to get ugly
If I don't get my way
So give me what I want
I always get what I want
You don't want to see me when
I don't get what I want, it's not what you want
If I don't get what I want, it's not what you want
